name: Give Gab (Play In Browser)
description:
Give Gab is a word game where you match phrases with one of the "Give" phrases represented by the hexagonal buttons.  Using the supplied phrases at the top of the screen, match with the corresponding "Give -" phrase.  For example "Freeze! You're under arrest" corresponds with "Up" as in "Give Up" which is what you should do when you're under arrest.

Click the hexagonal buttons before the time runs out.

You have 3 failed guesses each level before you lose.

The final level will go indefinitely.

Criticism and feedback appreciated!
